title: Game table system
description:
System to serve HTML5 games on multiplayer game tables. This proof of concept included the development of a WordPress backend that facilitated the delivery of games via a tiered subscription system.

I created a mediation layer that allowed developers to create content with their preferred HTML5 game engine. A small selection of games is provided as part of this demo version.

Please note that the app is not responsive as it was developed for game table displays.

The demo is best viewed at a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels.

title: StMonday golf wear website
description: Online shop for golf clothing start up. This is a WordPress site making use of the WooCommerce PlugIn for sales functionality. GDPR-compliant analytics are provided by Matomo. The site is running on a Virtual Private Server which I administer via SSH and a Plesk control panel.

title: Flood Watch app
description:
Team project: a browser dashboard app enabling users to search by location for real time flood warnings issued by The Environment Agency (EA), in England.

On load, the dashboard features a map which showing a general view of all current flood warnings.

If data is avalable for a location, the map zooms in to provide the user with more granular data.

title: Paperbird Publishing website
description: Site built in PHP using the Processwire content management system. I created a number of bespoke Processwire modules to allow the shop owner to easily manage content & orders and to read messages submitted via the site contact form. The styles were written in SASS using the BEM methodology.

title: Open Triviata Database
description: I created an API serving questions sourced from the Open Trivia Database with the useful addition of ID numbers. This involved writing a PHP program to synchronise the data an API that accepts the same queries as the original Open TriviaAPI. The webpage makes use of the UIKit CSS framework.
